document_data.name: Esloon Bezant
document_data.mainbody: '''Esloon Bezant''' was an exiled [[Red Wizard of Thay]] in [[Waterdeep]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Esloon had been exiled from [[Thay]] a few years before and settled in Waterdeep, where he started a small criminal organization in the [[Dock Ward of Waterdeep|Dock Ward]].

In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} the [[Zhentarim]] courted him in order to try to add his gang of thugs to their ranks. However, [[Jalester Silvermane]], under the orders of the [[Lords' Alliance]], wanted to hire some adventurers to ruin this alliance.
document_data.Personality: Esloon was too smart to get caught doing something illegal.
